thought: The text from the official Carve Designs website indicates that products such as the Tofino Top are priced at $62, while the Stinson Bottom is priced at $52. These prices are significantly higher than the "At Least 70% Off" prices listed on "https://www.swimcarvedesigns.com/". This discrepancy in pricing, along with the fact that "swimcarvedesigns.com" is not the official site and was recently created, adds to the suspicion. There are enough indicators to conclude that "https://www.swimcarvedesigns.com/" could be a scam website attempting to impersonate the legitimate brand. I now know the final answer. Based on the evidence gathered, including the unusually low prices, the recent creation of the domain, and the potential impersonation of a legitimate brand, I have concluded that "https://www.swimcarvedesigns.com/" is likely a scam website.
